name: The Last Job (BrokenGamesStudio, NVC_GameDevelopment)
description:
The Last Job created by NVC Fall 2022 Class.

*DISCLAIMER* Windows and google will tell you this file may contain a virus, it does not.

*This game is not finished and will be updated as the semester goes on, we would appreciate any feedback from the survey linked below.*
Game survey - https://forms.gle/4Zx1yWWT4nt7zbQy9

A game about finding clues and avoiding something seeking you out, then escape!

Upon download, unzip the game into a new, empty folder.
Click the "Last Job.exe" application to launch the game.

Controls:

WASD - Move Around
Left Shift - Sprint
TAB - Check objective
E - Interact

F - Flashlight

H (Dev mode) - God Mode (If you want to explore the map for fun!)

Thank you for downloading our game!

Current Build Date: 11/9/2022, version 3
